item.title: Fossil Men’s Townsman Stainless Steel and Leather Casual Quartz Chronograph Watch
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between. Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $160.00 - $91.92
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:31 UTC – Details)


Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.83 x 3.54 x 3.54 inches; 2.6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ FS5437
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 CR2 batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 2, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fossil Watches
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B079D9VSZD

Fossil has always been inspired by American creativity and ingenuity. Since 1984, we’ve strived to bring new life into the industry by making quality, fashionable watches and accessories that were both fun and accessible
Taking our cues from 1960s-era architectural and automotive design, our Townsman has a clean, symmetrical style and elevated construction. Elegantly vaulted hands, beveled indices and a shapely case make this timepiece a classic for decades to come
Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; quartz movement with three-hand chronograph display; hardened mineral crystal lens resists scratches; imported
Black stainless steel case with black dial; genuine dark brown leather band with adjustable buckle closure; interchangeable with all 22mm Fossil watch straps
Water resistant to 50m (165ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; 5 ATM
Customize your watch with complimentary engraving at a local Fossil store. Engraving is available at participating U.S. and Canadian full-priced and outlet Fossil stores. This service is not applicable on all accessories

OUR STORY

FOSSIL WAS INSPIRED BY AMERICAN CREATIVITY AND INGENUITY

Bringing new life into the watch industry by making quality, fashionable watches that were both fun and accessible. Creativity was at the heart of everything we did.


DESIGN FEATURES

WHAT MAKES US, US

OUR PRODUCT

Our collections celebrate our love for all things vintage with a nod to mid-century design. Our elevated ethos takes root in each and every style.

OUR SUCCESS RECIPE

Optimism, authenticity and, of course, our creative spirit. Everything we make complements every style and fits every lifestyle.

OUR TINSPIRATION

What if a package could communicate the soul of a brand? Our famous tins came to embody our young, fun, authentic brand and creative culture.

SEND A MESSAGE

It only takes a few letters to make a piece personal. Plus: It’s free*. *Available at participating Fossil stores.

MEET OUR COLLECTIONS

Previous page

  1. FOSSIL BLUE

    This collection debuts with four new bands: rich leather, sportier silicone, classic solid steel bracelet and stainless steel mesh bracelet that’s inspired by shark-proof chainmail dive suits.

    SEE NOW

  2. INSCRIPTION

    The square-shaped case was a turning point in watchmaking history. What’s old is new again—this archival Inscription watch is upgraded with a two-layered dial and exposed screws on its topring.

    SEE NOW

  3. BRONSON

    This rugged watch embodies a pioneering spirit. With bold, easy-read indices and luminescent accents, its oversized dial makes it an ideal timepiece for day or night.

    SEE NOW

  4. NEUTRA CHRONOGRAPH

    Refined and versatile, it’s made to be dressed up or dressed down.

    SEE NOW

  5. TOWNSMAN AUTOMATIC

    The skeleton dial on this 1950s-inspired timepiece reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings. The mainspring is wound automatically from the motion of the wearer’s arm—no battery needed.

    SEE NOW

Next page

TIME FOR CHANGE

DESIGN FOR THE FUTURE

Design and produce 100% of our products to meet our pro-planet criteria by 2025.

PRO-PLANET PACKAGING

Make 100% of our primary packaging recyclable and/or reusable by 2025.

REDUCE OUR FOOTPRINT

Reduce water consumption for leather tanning by 45% by 2025. Reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 30% by 2030.

2025 GOAL

Lead in circular business model approaches—where our materials can be used, reused and reduced—by 2025.

4.5
Price: $160.00 - $91.92
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:31 UTC – Details)

item.title: Fossil Men’s Townsman Stainless Steel Mechanical Automatic Watch

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between. Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $250.00 - $140.63
(as of Nov 29,2022 09:20:02 UTC – Details)


Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 1.73 x 0.87 x 0.47 inches; 0.02 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ME3098
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Metal batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 18, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fossil Watches
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01487C7CO

Transparently cool-Townsman reveals the inner workings of the watch with a innovative see-through dial. Whether dressing for the office or weekend, this timepiece has the mark of distinction
Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; automatic mechanical movement with analog display; skeleton dial reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings of the watch; self-winding; hardened mineral crystal lens resists scratches; imported
Black stainless steel case with black dial; genuine brown leather band with adjustable buckle closure; interchangeable with all 22mm Fossil watch straps
Water resistant to 50m (165ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; 5 ATM
An automatic—or self-winding—watch is a mechanical timepiece in which the mainspring is wound automatically from the natural motion of the wearer’s arm. This provides energy to run the watch, making manual winding and a battery unnecessary

OUR STORY

FOSSIL WAS INSPIRED BY AMERICAN CREATIVITY AND INGENUITY
